core

Class Location

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.Location

  • public class Location
extends java.lang.Object
    Location objects store a map of directions to neighbours and a 2D array of Tile objects.
    Author:
    Jonathan Carr, Jack Slater and Kyal Bond
